steps.instruction: Starting with the base to give time to set, crumble the digestive biscuits.
Melt the butter and add to the biscuits, mix thoughly and then press into the base of dishes / ramikins
For the top:  Slowly melt the chocolate then leave to cool
Mix together the cream cheese and icing sugar
Whip the double cream in a separate bowl
Fold the Cream into the Cream Cheese mixture and then fold through the cooled chocolate
Add on top of the bases and cool in the fridge over night
